derived_column_logic: (case when a.redemption_type = 'coins' then (a.amount/166.67) when a.redemption_type = 'goldcoins' then (a.amount/100) when a.redemption_type = 'upi' then (a.amount+0.2478) else a.amount end)

case when a.status = 1 and a.fulfillment_status = 3 then 'Given' when a.status = 1 and a.fulfillment_status = 2 then 'Processing' when a.status = 2 and a.fulfillment_status = 1 then 'Unscratched' when a.status = 1 and a.fulfillment_status = 1 then 'Pending' end

case when a.status = 1 and a.fulfillment_status = 3 then 'Given' when a.status = 1 and a.fulfillment_status = 2 then 'Processing' when a.status = 2 and a.fulfillment_status = 1 then 'Unscratched' when a.status = 1 and a.fulfillment_status = 1 then 'Pending' end
